Ice_Bolt.help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.targetHelp: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Ice_Blast.help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.targetHelp: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Frost_Breath.help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.targetHelp: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Aim.help: Greatly increases the Accuracy of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You take a moment to concentrate and are much more accurate for a short while.

Freeze_Ray.help: Although this power deals very little damage, the Freeze Ray encases your foe in a block of ice, holding him helpless in place for a while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Freeze_Ray.targetHelp: You are frozen solid by the Freeze Ray.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Ice_Storm.help: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Ice_Storm.shortHelp: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), Foe -Recharge, -SPD
Ice_Storm.targetHelp: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Freezing Rain.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's Accuracy. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.targetHelp: Your Accuracy, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Bolt.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Bitter_Freeze_Ray.help: This power can Hold your opponent frozen solid in a block of ice. The victim can be attacked and will remain frozen and helpless. After the ice thaws, the victim emerges chilled and Slowed. Bitter Freeze Ray deals medium damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Freeze_Ray.targetHelp: You are frozen solid by the Bitter Freeze Ray.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Blizzard.help: The massive damage from the Blizzard can Slow the attack rate of all your opponents in a large area, reducing their Accuracy and possibly knocking them back. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Very Long
Blizzard.shortHelp: Ranged (Location AoE), Extreme DoT(Cold), Foe -ACC, -SPD, -Recharge, Knockback, Self -Recovery
Blizzard.targetHelp: You are caught in a freezing Blizzard. You are freezing and your Attack rate, Accuracy and Movement speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has left you exhausted and helpless!

Ring_of_Fire.help: Immobilizes your target in a Ring of Fire. Deals some damage over time. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Medium
Ring_of_Fire.targetHelp: The Ring of Fire is burning you and holding you motionless.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Fire_Sword.help: Through concentration, you can create a sword of fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Fire_Sword.targetHelp: The Fire Sword has caught you on fire.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Combustion.help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Combustion.targetHelp: You have spontaneously combusted! You are burning!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Fire_Sword_Circle.help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fire_Sword_Circle.targetHelp: The Fire Sword has caught you on fire.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Build_Up.help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases Accuracy. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner fire with your {PowerName} and are more deadly for a short while.

Consume.help: You can Consume some fuel from your nearby enemies to recover Endurance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

Burn.help: You can ignite the ground beneath you, freeing yourself from Immobilization effects. Foes that enter the flames you leave behind will take damage. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Burn.targetHelp: You are caught in a roaring fire and burning!

Ethereal.help: You can Phase Shift to become out of sync with normal space. Although you do not become completely Invisible, you are translucent and hard to see. You are intangible, and cannot be affected by those in normal space.
